div.p:
Online user 1:
So what about drugs and impairment?

Online user 2:
It's not the same--I would never drink and drive, but I'm actually a lot better driver when I'm high.

Online user 3:
Oh come on, there's no way you're a better driver when you're stoned.

Online user 4:
No, it's true, I can't drink and drive for nothing, but when I'm high, I'm able to focus on the road.
